alert.note: Alert for Lane; Ness; Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 8:01PM CDT until August 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Scott County in west central Kansas... Northwestern Ness County in west central Kansas... Lane County in west central Kansas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 801 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southwest of Gove, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Healy, Shields, Dighton and Alamota. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
